feed.title: GitHub Kotlin Daily Trending

entry.title: yveskalume/gemini-chat
entry.summary:
a sample project using Gemini, the Google's latest family of large language models.

geminichat

This is a sample project using Gemini Pro and Gemini Pro Vision.

Gemini is the Google's latest family of large language models. Just a small chatbot using both gemini-pro and gemini-pro-vision models.

For the multi-turn conversations check the Chat Branch. But it does not support images, the gemini-pro-vision model (for text-and-image input) is not yet optimized for multi-turn conversations.

Demo video : https://github.com/yveskalume/gemini-chat/blob/main/preview/geminichat.mp4
